meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>buddy</radical> the <radical>sheep</radical> is part of a <kanji>flock</kanji>. A flock of sheep. Your sheep buddy is a member of a flock.
readingMnemonic: Now take out your <reading>gun</reading> (ぐん) and murder every sheep in the <kanji>flock</kanji>. Except for your buddy. You’re incredibly jealous of your buddy and you don’t like the attention his flock gives him so that’s why you decided to murder them all with a gun.
